titleStmt.title: Loyalty the ornament of Christianity, or, Scripture proofs for monarchy with comments in verse on each proof and applications relating to the unparallel'd rebellion in the West, wherein the arch-traitor Ferguson is in some measure anatomiz'd and his disciples characteriz'd / written by a souldier, Geo. Wood.
titleStmt.author: Wood, George, soldier.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Darby for the author,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
